relationships.description: Email correspondence between the two individuals
International diplomatic relationship between U.S. and Mexican presidents

analysis.purpose: To share political commentary and express admiration for Donald Trump's negotiating style
analysis.significance: Shows communication about political matters and admiration for Trump's aggressive diplomatic approach

notable_quotes: love his negotiating style as he makes me look soft..
If Mexico is unwilling to pay for the badly needed wall, then it would be better to cancel the upcoming meeting.

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present

illegal_activity.description: Document contains shared political commentary and news about Trump's diplomatic statements, not first-hand illegal activity

public_knowledge.context: This email references publicly reported diplomatic tensions between President Trump and Mexican President Pena Nieto regarding border wall funding in early 2017

analysis.summary: Richard Kahn emails Jeffrey E. expressing admiration for Donald Trump's negotiating style, forwarding Trump's tweets threatening to cancel a meeting with Mexico's president over border wall funding disputes.
